title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on Short Trips
content:
Navigate organically induced out-of-body experiences with Lamar and Franklin as they expand the LD Organics empire in Short Trips. Reunite the nostalgic duo and earn Double Rewards this week.

To dive into Short Trips straight away, bring up your iFruit and hit Quick Join > Contact Missions.
